Luxury Copier Brands and Models

June 24, 2025 Marga Enterprises

What Are Luxury Copiers?

Luxury copiers are high-end multifunction printers (MFPs) designed for businesses that demand more—more speed, more clarity, more features, and more durability. These machines offer advanced finishing options, enterprise-level security, seamless IT integration, and aesthetically pleasing designs ideal for executive offices or high-traffic workspaces.

For a broader overview of how they function and where they’re used, check out Luxury Copiers in Corporate Settings.

Top Luxury Copier Brands and Their Flagship Models

Let’s break down the industry’s most trusted and high-performing luxury copier brands.

1. Canon

Canon is a global leader known for quality imaging and innovation. Their imageRUNNER ADVANCE series combines high-speed output with cloud-ready functionality and modern design.

Top Model:

  • Canon imageRUNNER ADVANCE DX C5850i

    • 50 ppm color and black & white

    • Advanced document security

    • 10.1” touchscreen

    • Mobile printing and scan-to-cloud

This model is ideal for legal firms, finance offices, and large corporate teams that need consistent, high-quality output.

2. Ricoh

Ricoh’s IM C Series is built for adaptability, emphasizing user-friendly design, advanced security, and workflow automation.

Top Model:

  • Ricoh IM C6000

    • 60 ppm printing speed

    • AI-based interface learning

    • Smart integration with document management systems

    • Exceptional finishing options

This is an excellent fit for creative agencies and government offices that need reliability and fast, secure document flow.

3. Konica Minolta

Known for their cutting-edge technology, Konica Minolta’s bizhub i-Series features elegant interfaces, high-speed performance, and top-tier security.

Top Model:

  • Konica Minolta bizhub C750i

    • 75 ppm color and B/W

    • 10.1” multi-touch screen

    • Built-in antivirus protection

    • Custom workflow apps available

Perfect for enterprise-level environments requiring advanced customization and IT compatibility. Learn how to tailor your setup in Customization Options for Luxury Copiers.

4. Sharp

Sharp’s MX-Advanced Series is designed for smart collaboration and seamless cloud connectivity.

Top Model:

  • Sharp MX-7081

    • 70 ppm color

    • Voice control and mobile connectivity

    • Motion sensor for fast wake-up

    • Exceptional color accuracy

Ideal for marketing teams, universities, and design studios who prioritize visual quality and workflow speed.

5. Xerox

Xerox is a pioneer in digital printing with robust and secure solutions for high-demand environments.

Top Model:

  • Xerox AltaLink C8170

    • 70 ppm with ConnectKey technology

    • High-level encryption and user access control

    • Cloud integration (Dropbox, OneDrive, Google Drive)

    • Supports 300,000 pages/month duty cycle

Best suited for multinational corporations with large-scale document workflows.

Key Considerations When Choosing a Model

Before selecting a luxury copier, it’s important to consider:

  • Print volume – How many pages per month do you need?

  • Color vs. B/W – Do you need sharp visuals or just clean text?

  • Finishing options – Stapling, binding, folding, etc.

  • Integration – Can it work with your existing IT systems?

  • Security features – Is data protection built in?

See more on Integrating Luxury Copiers with IT Systems for seamless deployment.

Ongoing Maintenance and Support

Investing in a luxury copier doesn’t stop at installation. These machines require regular maintenance to ensure peak performance. Many rental providers include:

  • Scheduled service visits

  • Toner and consumables replacement

  • Remote diagnostics

  • Software updates

Explore how to protect your investment through Maintenance and Support for Luxury Copiers.

Security and Sustainability

High-end copiers come with powerful security features like:

  • User authentication (PIN, badge, or biometric)

  • Data encryption and secure print release

  • Auto data wiping after each job

Learn more in this guide on Security Features in Luxury Copiers.

And if your company values eco-conscious operations, many brands now offer energy-efficient modes, low-emission toners, and eco-certifications. Read about Environmental Considerations for Luxury Copiers for sustainable printing solutions.

Renting vs. Buying Luxury Copiers

Luxury copier models are an investment—but not all businesses need to buy one outright. Renting allows you to:

  • Lower upfront costs

  • Access newer models

  • Bundle maintenance and support

  • Scale your equipment as needed

Compare options in this helpful resource: Renting vs. Buying Luxury Copiers.

Final Thoughts

Choosing from the top Luxury Copier Brands and Models means investing in quality, reliability, and performance. Whether you're a growing startup, a creative agency, or a multinational firm, there’s a high-end copier tailored to your needs.

With trusted names like Canon, Ricoh, Konica Minolta, Sharp, and Xerox, and the option to rent instead of buy, it’s easier than ever to equip your office with a solution that blends power, aesthetics, and smart technology.

Ready to explore your options?
Visit Marga Copier Rental and let us help you find the perfect luxury copier model for your business.
